>
[Litany of Depravity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1689) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Prerequisites**
[tenets of evil](/Tenets.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You undercut your enemy's vain moralism, opening their heart to evil. You can cast the [_litany of depravity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=734) focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Litany of Depravity
